# DART

## Linters

| Linter                               | Configuration key            | Additional                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|--------------------------------------|------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [dartanalyzer](dart_dartanalyzer.md) | [DART](dart_dartanalyzer.md) | [![GitHub last commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/dart-lang/sdk)](https://github.com/dart-lang/sdk/commits) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/dart-lang/sdk?cacheSeconds=3600)](https://github.com/dart-lang/sdk) |

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.dart`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                  | Description                   | Default value |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| DART_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| DART_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
